title: Greystar Achieves Major Lift In Lead-To-Tour Conversion With MeetElise's AI
author: Nate Shames
summary: This article discusses how Greystar successfully improved its lead-to-tour conversion rates through the implementation of MeetElise's AI technology.
main_content:
"Our goal going into this was to see if AI could match our agent conversion rates. Now we're not only meeting our prospect to appointment performance, but we're also significantly improving it with MeetElise," said Brandon Chinn, Greystar's Director of Innovation.

---
